author: felicity
msg: log_socket may not be defined when spamd ends (when usage() runs, for instance...)

author: felicity
msg: bug 3283: had some issues with umask settings

author: felicity
msg: bug 3268: get_uri_list() was using decoded_body to find URIs, then looking at the HTML parser results for more uris.  however, the decoded_body has the HTML in it, so we were looking at the HTML twice, sometimes grabbing newline-separated uris.  so disable passing in a text array, and use the rendered text for RE matching, let the HTML parsing do the right thing there.  also, revert the redirector code.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3268: rule to look for generic HTTP redirects.  ignore redirects that are to the same domain.
